root: ^It's Dad's birthday soon, but I don't have enough money to buy him a present. What should I do?
^Buy some flowers and just be around Dad all day, taking good care of him
^Go and bet my last money in a casino
^Give him some cheap gift. After all, it's Dad's fault I'm broke

res1: ^It's been long since we had such great quality time together! It was a wonderful day
^It was my Dad's birthday, and I didn't have enough money to buy him a good present. So, I bought him flowers and spent the whole day around him. We had some good quality time together!
res2: ^I won! Not much, but enough for a nice present. Dad said I I've become a grown up man. I think so, too!

^It was my Dad's birthday, and I didn't have enough money to buy him a good present. So, I bet my last money in a casino and won enough for a nice gift. Dad said I'm all grown up now. I think so, too!
res3: ^Dad patted me on the shoulder, and I think there were tears in his eyes
^It was my Dad's birthday, and I didn't have enough money to buy him a good present. I crafted him a gift myself, and Dad was really moved.
res4: ^Dad warmly thanked me, and we had a good talk. It was a nice birthday!
^It was my Dad's birthday, and I didn't have enough money to buy him a good present. I gave him something cheap, but he was happy anyways.
